title: What is wrong with people today?
body:
Just what is up with people today? Most champ selects that I have gone through since Xayah's release have been against me wanting to try Xayah jg. I studied her kit and came to the conclusion that it could work well with clearing jg camps, but the people that get assigned adc start complaining that Xayah is only supposed to be an adc champ, while Graves is an adc champ also, but he's been played jg frequently. I just wanna try the new champ. -.-
Shouldn't matter how I do it in norms.

replies.body: I also gotta add that I got reported for no good reason earlier, because the adc didn't get his way. I played Xayah top.
Its release week, so that means people will fight to get their 5 games in
it's still hard to play them in bot games since they get instalocked

Just make sure you're using the old client (it gets into lobby faster) and start typing xa or rak as soon as you can into the searchbox. Don't bother calling out the role, just make sure you get the champ. I've been playing with her on bots to practice for 3 games now and had no problem so far.

I don't know how well Xayah would work in the jungle, but Graves is a jungler because his passive minion pushback keeps him from getting damage and his AoE allows him to clear quite easily, and he is no longer a bot lane ADC because the same pushback causes problems for wave management and his autos are both short range and blocked by minions.
Once Xayah hits level 2, her waveclear is great
wave clear or jg camp clear?
If clear times go up that means she gets worse at clearing...
yes, but there's smite to help with clearing
lol, I don't understand what you're trying to tell me.
Nightblue3 did it so you would think all the kids know that it's at least semi viable

People are idiots

League people... Are worse

Kind of just have to deal with it
